name: api_2d_Grid
description: Grid is the base class for plotting a layout of uniformly spaced points and lines.

properties.name: cellGap
properties.description: The size of the gap between each cell in the Grid.

properties.name: cellLayout
properties.description: The layout of the cells in the Grid.

properties.name: cellSize
properties.description: The size of each cell in the Grid.

properties.name: cellSwizzle
properties.description: The cell swizzle for the Grid.

properties.name: GetCellCenterLocal
properties.description: Get the logical center coordinate of a grid cell in local space.

properties.name: GetCellCenterWorld
properties.description: Get the logical center coordinate of a grid cell in world space.

properties.name: InverseSwizzle
properties.description: Does the inverse swizzle of the given position for given swizzle order.

properties.name: Swizzle
properties.description: Swizzles the given position with the given swizzle order.
